name: Countryside Life Simulator
description:
Start with a small plot of land and sell your crops at your market stall. Over time, you will acquire vast expanses of farmland, allowing you to reap bountiful harvests that you can then sell to purchase anything you desire.


The farmer cultivates his land by planting seedlings purchased from the seedling store, harvesting crops, and selling them in his store.


The farmer increases his profits by selling the crops he cultivates on his land directly to the people in his market stall.


There are means of transportation, such as cars, that make it easier for farmers to transport both crops and purchases.
